name: bc_api
description: 1. **Name**: The name of your product as a string. 2. **Price**: How much the items costs in number format. 3. **Type**:    1. **Physical**: Anything that is shipped to the customer, such as a t-shirt.    2. **Digital**: Products that the customer downloads, such as a PDF of an ebook. 4. **Weight**: How much the product weighs as a number. The measurement unit is determined by the store settings. 5. **Category**: The {category_id} for the category this product belongs to. An item can be assigned to more than one category. You can /GET the category id by using:
